name: College Kids Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What music group did Donna make up?
questions.explanation:
Single-cell paramecium.

	Donna was listing the musical talent for the concert that Josh had to attend.

questions.text: What is Jordan Kendall's middle name?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	Her full name was printed on the screen in the situation room while she and Leo were talking about her work.

questions.text: Josh has the patience of an adult.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He said that to Toby when they both started talking at the same time.

questions.text: Because of Title IX, how much has women's sports gone up?
questions.explanation:
800%.

	In 1972 Congress passed the Educational Amendments. One section of this law, Title IX, prohibits discrimination against girls and women in federally-funded education, including in athletics programs.

questions.text: Who wanted to go out and get girls?
What did Toby say wasn't a word?
questions.explanation:
favoristic.

	Sam: "We all agree with ya, Toby. We just don't think it's grounds for appeal."

rock the vote.

	CJ said this to a group of students at The House of Blues in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

questions.text: Who thought Debby Fiderer's name was funny?
While in the Oval Office, what did CJ call Fitz?
questions.explanation:
Sailor.

	Leo: "We're in the Oval Office." CJ: "I know."

questions.text: Did Debby suggest giving the President poison?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Charlie (reading her answer): "'Let's put some arsenic in the President's drinking water and see if he delegates some respect to the World Bank then.'"
